properties.entry: SELECT * FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ? AND IS_DELETED = 'N'
INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER(MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , EMAIL , GENDER , PHONE , BIRTH_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_MEM.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET IS_DELETED = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ?
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET TOTAL_PAYMENT = TOTAL_PAYMENT + ?, POINT = POINT - ? + ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT GRADE_NAME FROM TB_MEMBER_GRADE WHERE ? BETWEEN MIN AND MAX
